text: Dana Marie Perino (born May 9, 1972) is an American journalist. She was the White House Press Secretary under President George W. Bush, from September 2007 to January 2009. She is currently a political commentator working for Fox News. She works for the program The Five. Perino was born in Evanston, Wyoming. She was raised in Denver, Colorado. ==References== Category:White House Press Secretaries Category:Writers from Wyoming Category:American political commentators Category:Writers from Denver Category:American journalists Category:1972 births Category:Living people
title: Dana Perino
